line_1: Angry he comes, high on his Folds uprears
line_2: His speckled Form, and hides his secret Fears.

line_1: Now lightly with a soft embrace uprears
line_2: The lifeless load, and bathes it in his tears;

line_1: When the first sheaf its plumy top uprears.
line_2: From infancy to age alike appears,
Safe, in a trial by her peers. —
